analysis.description:
EtherDragonsCore.transferAmount (/unique_chucks/26/0x87056fbdebebe8e45b0d2e750770402868410263.sol#1220-1235) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _to.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/26/0x87056fbdebebe8e45b0d2e750770402868410263.sol#1226)
	- msg.sender.transfer(_transferCost) (/unique_chucks/26/0x87056fbdebebe8e45b0d2e750770402868410263.sol#1233-1234)

EtherDragonsCore.mintRelease (/unique_chucks/26/0x87056fbdebebe8e45b0d2e750770402868410263.sol#1249-1297) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_transferCost) (/unique_chucks/26/0x87056fbdebebe8e45b0d2e750770402868410263.sol#1296-1297)
